name: **Turk Island**
description: Turk Island V742-445 Sheet 84 Located at the eastern entrance to Laurenceâ€™s Cove on Bere Island, this is a small, low lying, narrow island. A navigable channel along its SSE flank divides it from Bere Island. Landing is on to a small stony beach in an obvious cut on the N side. The vegetation is ungrazed and is a mixture of rough grasses, furze, heather and bramble. Camping is possible at SW corner on a cushion of deep maritime grasses. No water. Good periwinkle density.
